titles.title: Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael (fols. 2ra-93ra) I-1) Homily by Timothy (Dämatiwos), Patriarch of Alexandria for the 12th of Ḫǝdar (fols. 2ra-8rb); miracle (fols. 8rb-9vb, 11ra); commemorative notice (fols. 11ra-13ra); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 13ra) I-2) Homily by an anonymous author [for Taḫśaś] (fols. 13ra-18va); miracle (fols. 18va-vb, 10ra-vb, 19ra); commemorative notice (fol. 19ra-va); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 19va-vb) I-3) Homily [by Epiphanius, Metropolitan of Cyprus] for the 12th of Ṭǝrr (fols. 19vb-27rb); miracle (fols. 27va-28rb); commemorative notice (fol. 28va-vb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 28vb) I-4) Homily by an anonymous author [for Yäkkatit] (fols. 28vb-31rb); miracle (fols. 31rb-32va); commemorative notice (fol. 32va-vb); ʿarke-hymn (fols. 32vb-33ra) I-5) Homily by [Severus] Patriarch of Antiochia for the 12th of Mäggabit (fols. 33ra-44va); miracle (fols. 44va-46vb); commemorative notice (fols. 46vb-47ra) I-6) Homily by [Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs] the Orthodox [for Miyazya] (fols. 47ra-50va); miracle (fols. 50va-52vb); commemorative notice (fols. 52vb-53rb) I-7) Homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of Rom [Ethiopia] for the 12th of Gǝnbot (fols. 53rb-54va); miracle (fols. 54vb-56vb); commemorative notice (fols. 56vb-57ra); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 57ra-rb) I-8) Homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of ʾAksum (ʾAkwǝsǝm) [for Säne] (fols. 57rb-62rb); miracle (fols. 62rb-64rb); commemorative notice (fols. 64rb-69va); ʿarke-hymn (fols. 69va-70ra) I-9) Homily by Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs [for Ḥamle] (fols. 70ra-73va); miracle (fols. 73va-75rb); commemorative notice (fol. 75rb-vb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 75vb) I-10) Homily by the 24 Heavenly Priests [anonymous author] [for Näḥase] (fols. 75vb-78ra); miracle (fols. 78rb-82vb); commemorative notice (fols. 82vb-83ra); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 83ra) I-11) Homily by an anonymous author [for Mäskäräm] (fols. 83ra-85rb); miracle (fols. 85rb-86ra); commemorative notice (fol. 86ra-rb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 86rb-va) I-12) Homily by an anonymous author [for Ṭǝqǝmt] (fols. 86va-89va); miracle (fols. 89va-91vb); commemorative notice (fols. 91vb-92rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 92rb-va) I-13) Zä-ʾaqräbku maḫletä… "The song I am offering…" (concluding prayer) (fol. 92va-vb) I-14) List of the deeds of St. Michael (በሰኔ: ባሕራንን፡ ከመርቅያ፡ አዳነ፡ በሐምሌ፡ ለሰናክሬም፡ እጠፋ፡ በነሐሴ፡ …) (fols. 92vb-93ra), in Amharic
Additio 1.

copyists.copyist: Wäldä ʾIyäsus is mentioned as the scribe in Additio 1.

donors.donor: According to Additio 1, Gäbrä Ṣadǝq donated the Ms. to the church of Dändära Mikaʾel. His name and the name of his wife, ʾAmätä Mikaʾel, were written in supplication formulas over the (sometimes erased) names of the original donors, probably in the same hand that wrote Additio 1. The names of the original donors can be deciphered as Wäldä Mikaʾel and Wälättä Gärima (s. fols. 19ra, 28vb, 32va); the name of Täsfa ʾIyäsus is written on fol. 57ra.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. was resewn. The sewing is damaged and has been crudely repaired with synthetic threads. The leather cover has been cut off from the spine, probably to facilitate the resewing. Some fols. are stained with water: fols. 1r-3v, 29ra-35rb. Holes or tears amended on fols. 1, 45, 47, 49, 53, 70, 88.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish brown tooled leather (partly missing). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 6 tools were used: double line fillet, interlaced line fillet, double circle, dot fillet, corni-from, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

squires.squire:
A(1; s.l.: 1, stub after 1/fols. 1r-v) – ፩I(8/fols. 2r-9v) – ፪II(8/fols. 11r-18v) – ፫III(8/fols. 10rv, 19r-25v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 26r-33v) – ፭V(8/fols. 34r-41v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 42r-49v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 50r-57v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 58r-65v) – ፱IX(8/fols. 66r-73v) – ፲X(7; s.l.: 2, stub after 6/fols. 74r-80v) – ፲፩XI(8/fols. 81r-88v) – ፲፪XII(5; s.l.: 1, stub after 5/fols. 89r-93v)
Quire II has been misplaced after the first fol. of quire III.

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The handwriting is slightly left-sloping; it appears sometimes quite irregular (due to the change of pen, slight variation in letter size? cp. fols. 60va-63vb, 88ra-93ra).

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist; names of the previous donors (in most cases erased and replaced with that of other names in black ink); elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Text I (alternating with black lines); two initial lines in the incipit of sections (homilies) and subsections (miracles and commemorative notices); the first word in the incipit of subsections (hymns), i.e. sälam "salutation".

otherdetails.otherdetail: Texts I-5 and I-6 are not followed by an ʿarke-hymn as all other sections.

additional.det: The note is written in a hand which is similar, but possibly not identical with the main one. The name Mikaʾel Dändära is written over erasure.

extras.extra: - The title ሚካኤል is written on the back board with modern paint. - Corrections written over erasures: e.g., fols. 71rb, 73vb, 80vb. - Erroneously written words are encircled, in a secondary hand: fols. 32rb, 32va, 73ra. - Tämälläs-sign (in the shape of +) indicating the place where the omission, written in the upper margin in pen, belong: fols. 73rb, 82va. - Scribbles: fols. 1v, 93v.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Undecorated quire marks are written in the left upper corner of fols. 2r: ፩, 11r: ፪, 10r: ፫ (?), 26r: ፬, 34r: ፭, 42r: ፮, 50r: ፯, 58r: ፰, 66r: ፱, 74r: ፲, 81r: ፲፩, 89r: ፲፪.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Monthly readings are indicated by the names of the months written in the upper margin: ዘኅዳር: fol. 2ra ዘታኅሣሥ: fol. 13ra ዘጥር: fol. 19vb ዘየካቲት: fol. 28vb ዘመጋቢት: fol. 33ra ዘሚያዝያ: fol. 47ra ዘግንቦት: fol. 53rb ዘሰኔ: fol. 57rb ዘሐምሌ: fol. 70ra ዘነሐሴ: fol. 75vb ዘመስከረም: fol. 83ra ዘጥቅምት: fol. 86va.
